Publications-API-Usage

Source: vignettes/Publications-API-Usage.Rmd
Publications-API-Usage.Rmd

The function providing access to KTH Publications API data can provide some overview stats, list the active public users, active users with publications and more. Some usage examples:

library(kthapi)
library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:base':
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
kth_publications("stats")
#> Sending GET to url: https://api.kth.se/api/publications/v1/stats
#> <KTH API call for stats>
#> $activeUsers
#> [1] 3279
#> 
#> $publicUsers
#> [1] 1053

# top 5 active public users with publication counts
kth_publications("activePublicUsers")$content$users %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  setNames(., nm = c("count", "kthid", "username")) %>%
  arrange(desc(count)) %>%
  select(-kthid) %>%
  slice(1:5) %>%
  knitr::kable()
#> Sending GET to url: https://api.kth.se/api/publications/v1/activePublicUsers
count username
747 sorlin
731 kallej
686 flaurell
680 hagren
581 lorenzof 
#kth_publications("activeUsersWithPublications")$content$users %>% 
#  as_tibble() %>%
#  slice(1:5)

# some users provide public access to publications
fp <-
  kth_publications("filteredPublications", username = "pal")$content
#> Sending GET to url: https://api.kth.se/api/publications/v1/filteredPublications/pal

fp$filteredPublications %>% as_tibble() %>% slice(1:5) %>% select(title)
#> # A tibble: 5 x 1
#>   title                                                                         
#>   <chr>                                                                         
#> 1 EMMA - the electric and magnetic monitor of the aurora on Astrid-2            
#> 2 The EMMA Instrument on the Astrid-2 Micro-Satellite                           
#> 3 Temporal and spatial evolution of discrete auroral arcs as seen by Cluster    
#> 4 First results of electric field and density observations by Cluster EFW based…
#> 5 Disturbance of plasma environment in the vicinity of the Astrid-2 microsatell…

# available fields for publication data
fp$filteredPublications %>% as_tibble() %>% slice(1:5) %>% names()
#>  [1] "publicationId"             "organizationId"           
#>  [3] "topics"                    "authors"                  
#>  [5] "seriesIssueNr"             "seriesTitle"              
#>  [7] "patent"                    "statementOfResponsibility"
#>  [9] "identifierUri"             "bookEdition"              
#> [11] "bookPublisher"             "bookPlace"                
#> [13] "conferenceName"            "recordOrigin"             
#> [15] "hostExtentEnd"             "hostExtentStart"          
#> [17] "hostIssue"                 "hostVolume"               
#> [19] "hostSubTitle"              "hostTitle"                
#> [21] "contentTypeCode"           "publicationSubTypeCode"   
#> [23] "publicationTypeCode"       "dateIssued"               
#> [25] "publicationStatus"         "subTitle"                 
#> [27] "title"                     "visible"

# example record
fp$filteredPublications %>% as_tibble() %>% slice(1:1) %>% glimpse()
#> Rows: 1
#> Columns: 28
#> $ publicationId             <chr> "diva2:341912"
#> $ organizationId            <chr> "6176"
#> $ topics                    <list> [<data.frame[14 x 1]>]
#> $ authors                   <list> [<data.frame[14 x 3]>]
#> $ seriesIssueNr             <chr> ""
#> $ seriesTitle               <chr> ""
#> $ patent                    <chr> ""
#> $ statementOfResponsibility <chr> ""
#> $ identifierUri             <chr> "http://urn.kb.se/resolve?urn=urn:nbn:se:kt…
#> $ bookEdition               <chr> ""
#> $ bookPublisher             <chr> ""
#> $ bookPlace                 <chr> ""
#> $ conferenceName            <chr> ""
#> $ recordOrigin              <chr> ""
#> $ hostExtentEnd             <chr> "123"
#> $ hostExtentStart           <chr> "115"
#> $ hostIssue                 <chr> "1"
#> $ hostVolume                <chr> "22"
#> $ hostSubTitle              <chr> ""
#> $ hostTitle                 <chr> "Annales Geophysicae"
#> $ contentTypeCode           <chr> "refereed"
#> $ publicationSubTypeCode    <chr> ""
#> $ publicationTypeCode       <chr> "article"
#> $ dateIssued                <chr> "2004"
#> $ publicationStatus         <chr> "Published"
#> $ subTitle                  <chr> ""
#> $ title                     <chr> "EMMA - the electric and magnetic monitor o…
#> $ visible                   <lgl> TRUE

# whether the user provides public access can be checked with the userstatus call
kth_publications("userstatus", username = "pal")$public
#> Sending GET to url: https://api.kth.se/api/publications/v1/userstatus/pal
#> NULL

# not all users have registered publications
tryCatch(
  kth_publications("filteredPublications", username = "mskyttner"),
  error = function(e) e)
#> Sending GET to url: https://api.kth.se/api/publications/v1/filteredPublications/mskyttner
#> <simpleError: The API returned an error>

# organisations can be queried
kth_publications("organisations")$content %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  slice(1:5)
#> Sending GET to url: https://api.kth.se/api/publications/v1/organisations
#> # A tibble: 5 x 3
#>       id name$en                 $sv                   nameLocalized            
#>    <int> <chr>                   <chr>                 <chr>                    
#> 1    177 KTH                     KTH                   KTH                      
#> 2  12851 Centres                 Centra                Centres                  
#> 3  12850 Nordic Institute for T… Nordic Institute for… Nordic Institute for The…
#> 4   5921 Science for Life Labor… Science for Life Lab… Science for Life Laborat…
#> 5 878400 KTH Center for Applied… KTH Center for Appli… KTH Center for Applied P…
